Package org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.opt

Class SimulationOptimizer

java.lang.Object
org.svvrl.goal.core.AbstractAlgorithm
org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.opt.SimulationOptimizer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, Algorithm, AlgorithmListener, AutomatonOptimizer<FSA>
public class SimulationOptimizer
extends AbstractAlgorithm
implements AutomatonOptimizer<FSA>
Use the simulation relations to reduce the state space [Fabio Somenzi and Roderick Bloem. Efficient Buchi automata from LTL Formulae. CAV 2000].
Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai

    Constructs this optimization algorithm with default options.

    Constructs this optimization algorithm with custom options.

  • Method Details

    • directSimplify

      public void directSimplify​(FSA aut) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Applies direct-simulation simplification on a specified automaton. The transition display of the automaton is assumed to be complete.
      Parameters:
      aut - a finite state automaton to be simplified
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the default simulation cannot be used for the specified automaton

    • directSimplify

      public void directSimplify​(FSA aut, Simulation sim)
      Applies direct-simulation simplification on a specified automaton based on a specified simulation relation. The transition display of the automaton is assumed to be complete.
      Parameters:
      aut - a finite state automaton to be simplified
      sim - a simulation relation
      See Also:
      directSimplifyByDirectSimulationEquivalence(FSA, Simulation), directSimplifyByDirectSimulation(FSA, Simulation), StateReducer.removeDead(org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.Automaton), StateReducer.removeUnreachable(org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.Automaton)

    • directSimplifyByDirectSimulationEquivalence

      public void directSimplifyByDirectSimulationEquivalence​(FSA aut, Simulation sim)
      Applies direct-simulation simplification on a specified automaton based on the direct simulation equivalence of a specified simulation relation. The transition display of the automaton is assumed to be complete.
      Parameters:
      aut - a finite state automaton to be simplified
      sim - a simulation relation

    • directSimplifyByDirectSimulation

      public void directSimplifyByDirectSimulation​(FSA aut, Simulation sim)
      Applies direct-simulation simplification on a specified automaton based on the direct simulation of a specified simulation relation. The transition display of the automaton is assumed to be complete.
      Parameters:
      aut - a finite state automaton to be simplified
      sim - a simulation relation

    • reverseSimplify

      public void reverseSimplify​(FSA aut, Simulation sim)
      Applies reverse-simulation simplification on a specified automaton based on a specified simulation relation. The transition display of the automaton is assumed to be complete.
      Parameters:
      aut - a finite state automaton to be simplified
      sim - a simulation relation
      See Also:

      public void optimize​(FSA aut) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
